entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
